issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Compile the following code to device (compile with rhino)
{code}
var buffer = Ti.createBuffer();
buffer.append() // illegal call, missing required arguments.
{code}

Actual
Source is blank

Expected:
Source: buffer.append() //illegal call, missing required arguments.

Note: 
Behaves the same in 1.7.5 but works with v8
fields.summary: Android: Runtime Exception: Rhino: When the runtime exception is displayed, the Source: is blank

comments.body: Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
